data.id: Numerical value assigned to course based on its 'subject' and its 'courseNumber'. It is the combination of the course's 'subject ID' and its 'courseNumber'.
data.termEffective: Current value of term according to the year and semester. Follows Stetson's original system.
data.courseNumber: Numerical value that corresponds to the course's number for registration. Ex.: 141 for CSCI141
data.subject: Alphanumeric abbreviation of the major or area that the course corresponds with. CSCI for Computer Science, etc.
data.subjectCode: Duplication of the value paired with the course's 'subject' key.
data.subjectId: Numerical value assigned to the subject that the course belongs to.
data.college: The school that oversees the course. This could be 'College of Arts and Sciences', 'School of Business', etc.
data.collegeCode: Alphanumeric abbreviation of the value paired with the course's 'college' key.
data.department: Faculty department that the course corresponds with. Ex: American Studies, Mathematics, etc.
data.departmentCode: Alphanumeric abbreviation of the value paired with the course's 'department' key.
data.numberOfUnits: Numerical value that represents the number of units the course is worth.
data.attributes: A list of all the General Education attributes that this course possesses.
data.ceu: Continuing Education Unit. Used in continuing education programs to assist professionals in maintaining their license in their profession.
data.scheduleType: A two-letter abbreviation of the value for the course's 'scheduleTypeDescription' key.
data.scheduleTypeDescription: THe full definition of what the value of the 'scheduleType' key represents.
data.restrictions: Specifies when this course is offered. Has acceptable values of: ['Fall Only', 'Spring Only', 'Fall and Spring']
data.restrictionsPeriod: Specifies how often this course is offered. Has acceptable values of ['Every semester', 'Annually', 'Every two years', 'Every three years', etc.]
data.creditHourLow: The minimum number of credits that a student can receive for this course.
data.creditHourHigh: The maximum number of credits that a student can receive for this course.
data.creditHourIndicator: There are only three acceptable values for this key: [null, 'TO', 'OR']
data.subjectDescription: The full definition of what the value of the 'subject' key represents.
data.courseDescription: A description of the topics covered in the course and how it might be structured.
data.termStart: The Semester during which this course was first offered.
data.prerequisites: A list of the prerequisites that are required for a student to register for this course.
